英文法規名稱: Hygiene Standards for Alcohol Products Containers
沿革內容:
1. The MOF and The DOH, pursuant to Tai-Tsai-Ku-Tzu No.09603508740 and Wei-Shu-Shih-Tzu No.0960404465, promulgated “Hygiene Standards for Alcohol Products Containers” on June 22ed, 2007.
2. The MOF and The DOH, pursuant to Tai-Tsai-Ku-Tzu No.10103618560 and Wei-Shu-Shih-Tzu No.1011300678, promulgated the amendment of Article 6 and Appendix of Article 5 of “Hygiene Standards for Alcohol Products Containers” on March 29th, 2012.
3. The MOF and The MOHW, pursuant to Tai-Tsai-Ku-Tzu No.10203758210 and Bu-Shou-Shih-Tzu No.1021351402, promulgated the amendment of Article 6 and Appendix of Article 5 of “Hygiene Standards for Alcohol Products Containers” on December 4th, 2013.

法規內容.條文內容: The Standards enacted herein are pursuant to Article 27, Paragraph 2 of The Tobacco and Alcohol Administration Act.
The Standards is applicable to entire alcohol products containers, including the capping of covers, pads and stoppers.
The plastic alcohol products containers shall not be recycled for reuse.
The alcohol products containers shall not have any of the following circumstances; unacceptable discoloration, unusual odor and flavor, contamination, mould, contain foreign matter or fibre fall off.
The alcohol products containers shall meet requirements prescribed in the Table of Test Standards for Alcohol Products Containers (refer to the appendix)

The Standards shall be enforced on January 1, 2008.
The amended articles hereof shall come into effect as of the day of promulgation. However, the appendix of Article 5 of the Regulation amended on December 4, 2013 shall be implemented six months after the promulgation of this Act.
